name: Walrein
description: The Ice Break Pokémon. Walrein swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing icebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer of blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: This Pokemon takes half the damage it otherwise would from Ice and Fire damage.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: While it is snowing or hailing, this Pokémon heals for an amount of HP equal to its proficiency modifier at the end of each of its turns.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to moves that attempt to charm or taunt it.
